entry.title: Saturday: Near blizzard. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
